dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2422 IH: Consolidating Aerospace Programs Efficiently at Canaveral Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Donalds (for himself, Mr. Diaz-Balart, Ms. Wasserman Schultz, and Mr. Moskowitz) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To transfer the headquarters of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to Brevard County, Florida, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Consolidating Aerospace Programs Efficiently at Canaveral Act or the CAPE Canaveral Act.

section.header: Transfer of National Aeronautics and Space Administration headquarters to Brevard County, Florida
section.text: Not later than one year after the date of the enactment of this Act, the headquarters of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration shall be transferred to Brevard County, Florida.
